extensionShortHeaders.shortDescription: Align objects on the scene relatively to the window (or screen size).
extensionShortHeaders.name: AlignObject

extensionShortHeaders.shortDescription: Make the object go on the left, then when some distance is reached, flip and go back to the right. Make sure that your object has two animations called "GoLeft" and "TurnLeft".
extensionShortHeaders.name: AnimatedBackAndForthMovement

extensionShortHeaders.shortDescription: Animate the text to simulate it being written character by character (also called "typewriter" effect), with a customizable time between each character. Useful for dialogue scenes or visual novels.
extensionShortHeaders.fullName: Auto typing animation for texts ("typewriter" effect)
extensionShortHeaders.name: AutoTyping

extensionShortHeaders.shortDescription: Provides an action to make the object bounce from another object it just touched. Add a permanent force to the object and, when in collision with another one, use the action to make it bounce realistically.
extensionShortHeaders.name: Bounce

extensionShortHeaders.shortDescription: Shake the camera on the specified layer using one or more methods of shaking (position, angle, zoom)
extensionShortHeaders.name: CameraShake

extensionShortHeaders.shortDescription: Expression returning the content of the clipboard.
extensionShortHeaders.name: Clipboard

extensionShortHeaders.shortDescription: Expressions to convert RGB color values into various other colour formats (HSV, HSL, named colors) and vice versa.
extensionShortHeaders.name: ColorConversion

extensionShortHeaders.shortDescription: Select the object, choose the number of rows and columns, the spacing between rows and columns, the top left starting point, the layer to create the objects on, and the z-order of the objects.
extensionShortHeaders.fullName: Create multiple copies of an object
extensionShortHeaders.name: CreateMultipleCopiesOfObject

extensionShortHeaders.shortDescription: Provides an action to change the type of the cursor, and a behavior to change the cursor when an object is hovered.
extensionShortHeaders.name: CursorType

extensionShortHeaders.shortDescription: An action to move the camera by dragging with the mouse (or scrolling with the touch), on vertical, horizontal or both directions.
extensionShortHeaders.name: DragCameraWithPointer

extensionShortHeaders.shortDescription: Additional math functions and constants expressions.
extensionShortHeaders.name: ExtendedMath

extensionShortHeaders.shortDescription: Conditions and actions to check for the existence of a variable, or delete existing ones from memory.
extensionShortHeaders.name: ExtendedVariables
extensionShortHeaders.tags: variables, scene variables, global variables, object variables

extensionShortHeaders.shortDescription: Allow the object to fire bullets, with customizable speed, angle and fire rate.
extensionShortHeaders.name: FireBullet

extensionShortHeaders.shortDescription:
Make the object flash (blink) for a period of time, so that it is alternately visible and invisible.
Trigger the effect by using the Flash action.
extensionShortHeaders.name: Flash
extensionShortHeaders.tags: flash, blink, visible, invisible, hit, damage

extensionShortHeaders.shortDescription: Add support for gamepads (or other controllers) to your game, giving access to information such as button presses, axis positions, trigger pressure, etc...
extensionShortHeaders.name: Gamepads
extensionShortHeaders.tags: controllers, gamepads, joysticks, axis, xbox, ps4

extensionShortHeaders.shortDescription: Add actions and conditions to manage the life of the object. Object can get damages, lose some health and you can check with a condition if it's dead.
extensionShortHeaders.fullName: Health (life points and damages for objects)
extensionShortHeaders.name: Health

extensionShortHeaders.shortDescription: Checks if the device running the game is connected to the internet.
extensionShortHeaders.name: InternetConnectivity

extensionShortHeaders.shortDescription: Allows to input the classic Konami Code ("Up, Up, Down, Down, Left, Right, Left, Right, B, A") into a scene for cheats and easter eggs.
extensionShortHeaders.name: KonamiCode

extensionShortHeaders.shortDescription: When hosted on Kongregate.com, use Kongregate services to get information about the user, submit scores or interact with the Kongregate page.
extensionShortHeaders.name: Kongregate

extensionShortHeaders.shortDescription: Get the preferred language of the user, set on their browser or device.
extensionShortHeaders.name: Language

extensionShortHeaders.shortDescription: Move the object linearly, according to the speed configured on X and Y axis. Useful for simple enemies, bullets or objects following a straight line on the screen.
extensionShortHeaders.name: LinearMovement

extensionShortHeaders.shortDescription: An MQTT client for GDevelop: allow connections to a MQTT server and send/receive messages.
extensionShortHeaders.name: MQTT

extensionShortHeaders.shortDescription: Expressions for generating Perlin and simplex noise values (2D or 3D). Useful for procedural generation.
extensionShortHeaders.name: Noise
extensionShortHeaders.tags: perlin noise, simplex noise, procedural generation

extensionShortHeaders.shortDescription: Behaviors to animate Tiled Sprite objects in the background, following the camera with a parallax effect.
extensionShortHeaders.name: Parallax

extensionShortHeaders.shortDescription: Create a random color for a scene, an object, or any other color input.
extensionShortHeaders.name: RandomColor

extensionShortHeaders.shortDescription: This extension rotates all alphabetic characters in a string by 13 characters.
extensionShortHeaders.name: Rotate13

extensionShortHeaders.shortDescription: Allow an object to move smoothly on the X and/or Y axis following a sine wave, or an ellipsis.
extensionShortHeaders.name: SineMovement

extensionShortHeaders.shortDescription: Action to snap objects to a virtual grid during the game.
extensionShortHeaders.fullName: Snap objects to a virtual grid
extensionShortHeaders.name: SnapToGrid

extensionShortHeaders.shortDescription: Allow to use a sprite object to mask another.
extensionShortHeaders.name: SpriteMasking

extensionShortHeaders.shortDescription: Force the object to stay visible on the screen by setting back its position inside the viewport of the camera.
extensionShortHeaders.name: StayOnScreen

extensionShortHeaders.shortDescription: A behavior that detects a swipe being done on the screen, and that gives you information about it, including the direction and the length.
extensionShortHeaders.name: Swipe

extensionShortHeaders.shortDescription: Allow to open and close the virtual keyboard on mobile (iOS, Android). To be used with Text Entry objects.
extensionShortHeaders.fullName: Mobile virtual keyboard for Text Entry
extensionShortHeaders.name: TextEntryVirtualKeyboard

extensionShortHeaders.shortDescription: Expressions to transform time in seconds to format like HH:MM:SS. Ideal to display timers on screen.
extensionShortHeaders.name: TimeFormatter
extensionShortHeaders.tags: time, timer, format, hours, minutes, seconds

extensionShortHeaders.shortDescription: This behavior moves an object (like an enemy) for a chosen time or distance, then flips it and starts over, moving the object back and forth, vertically or horizontally.
extensionShortHeaders.name: TimedBackAndForthMovement
extensionShortHeaders.tags: enemy, movement, back, forth, up, down, left, right

extensionShortHeaders.shortDescription: Make object travel to random positions (with the pathfinding behavior).
extensionShortHeaders.fullName: Make object travel to random positions
extensionShortHeaders.name: TravelToRandomPositions

extensionShortHeaders.shortDescription: Create an illusion of depth by setting the Z-order based on the Y position of the object. Useful for isometric games, 2D games with a "Top-Down" view, RPG...
extensionShortHeaders.name: YSort
extensionShortHeaders.tags: z-order, y-sort, depth, fake-depth, isometric-depth, rpg

extensionShortHeaders.shortDescription: Use the Yandex.Games SDK to display ads published on the Yandex.Games platform.
extensionShortHeaders.name: YandexGamesSDK
